summary: Some fixes and additions to Dragonborn\'s Severin Manor to make it more appealing.
descriptionHtml:
[size=10][b]Severin Manor improvements[/b][/size]

***Update 22/3 (Main Version)
- Final version.
- Food Crates are Back and working as intended, static containers.

***Update 12/3 (Main Version)
- Had to remove food crates due to them moving around.
- New: Activatable Wine Rack next to Dunmer Liquor rack.
- Re-organized the Enchanting room.
- Forgot to edit the navmesh to accommodate the changes I made in the previous version. fixed it.
- Cleaned with tes5edit (undeleted ref\'s).

***Update 12/3 (Main Version)
- New: An activatable unique Soul Gem Chest in the enchanting room for your soul gem storage.
- New: An activatable unique Liquor Rack in the main hall using the new Dunmer Liquor Bottles for your Drinks storage.
- New: Bookshelf in Enchanting room under the Soul Gem Chest.
- New: A Display case in the Enchanting room .
- New: 2 new Mannequins and rack sets in front of the main Bed.
- New: 2 new Mannequins and rack sets in front of the guest Bed.
- Fix: All shadow striping from lights should now be fixed.
- Fix: The bed in the guest room has been assigned to player faction rather than the player, so it would be usable for guests/followers if you use a mod for that.

***Update 28/2 (Main Version)
- Vanilla fix: Added real activators to Display cases that Bethesda forgot/ignored. you can now properly \"insert\" weapons in them. Not staffs though.
- The chest in front of main bed is now a nice looking footlocker instead. the original chest is not removed but moved to the left so your stuff is safe.
- crafting area safe was incorrectly using the same base as the bedroom safe. turned into a different ID safe. [u]remove your items from that one safe before upgrading.[/u] All other containers in the house are upgrade-safe.
- Added a mannequin and 2 racks to the corridor leading to crafting area.
- Added a mannequin and 2 racks to the side bedroom.
- Turned 2 static barrels in crafting area to container barrels.
- Strong Box in the bedroom above the safe is now a proper container.
- New Bookcase and chair in main Hall.
- Increased light slightly in the tanning rack area.
- New idle markers added in house, useful if you have a followersandboxing around so they\'d do something else rather than chomp on food all day.

***Update 23/2 (Main Version)
- Fixed the flickering light in the crafting area
- The right bookcase in the bedroom now has an additional bookshelf for your books

***Update 18/2 (Both main and lite version)
- Cleaned with tes5edit
- lantern above main bed dimmed a little
- removed useless baskets near bedroom bookcase and put a chair next to it instead

***Update 16/2
Both Main and lite versions updated with final fixes to flickering lights and Now the Main hall, Main corridor and bedrooms all have shadow-casting lights.

[FONT=Impact][size=5][color=green]Description[/size][/color][/font]

Severin Manor is a spacious and interesting home, but has a few annoyances that I set out to fix

[FONT=Impact][size=5][color=green]Features, fixes and additions[/size][/color][/font]

- [u]Fix:[/u] The music in the house is no longer dungeon music but main Solstheim music.

- [u]Tweak:[/u] The Nordic horn chandeliers has been replaced by Dunmer lanterns (seriously, they made these great looking Dunmer lanterns then put generic Skyrim chandeliers in the only Dunmer player house?)

- [u]Tweak:[/u] Dark areas have been relit by additional lanterns.

- [u]New:[/u] An activatable unique Soul Gem Chest in the enchanting room for your soul gem storage.

- [u]New:[/u] Activatable unique Wine and Liquor Racks in the main hall using the new Dunmer Liquor Bottles for your Drinks storage.

- [u]New:[/u] 4 Activatable unique Food crates with food meshes nicely organized in them: Meat crate, Ash Foods crate, Cheese and Bread crate, and Produce crate. see screenshots.

- [u]New:[/u] Display case in Enchanting Room.

- [u]New:[/u] Bookshelf in Enchanting room under the Soul Gem Chest.

- [u]New:[/u] 2 new Mannequins and rack sets in front of the main Bed.

- [u]New:[/u] 2 new Mannequins and rack sets in front of the guest Bed.

- [u]New:[/u] Added Satchels on the alchemy and enchanting tables (lite version), and ingredient/potion crates in New items version. see screenshots.

- [u]New: [/u] items version has some new decorative items in main bedroom.

- [u]New:[/u] Added safe and box in crafting area (lite version), and New items version has an ore crate and ingot box.

[u]Vanilla fix:[/u] Added real activators to Display cases that Bethesda forgot/ignored. you can now properly \"insert\" weapons in them. Not staffs though.

- [u]Tweak:[/u] Turned 2 static barrels in crafting area to container barrels.

- [u]New:[/u] Bookcase and chair in main Hall.

- [u]New:[/u] mannequin and 2 racks to the corridor leading to crafting area.

- [u]New:[/u] mannequin and 2 racks to the side bedroom.

- [u]New:[/u] idle markers added in house, useful if you have a follower/spouse sand-boxing around so they\'d do something else rather than chomp on food all day.

- [u]Tweak:[/u] Excessive amounts of hay in the main hall have been removed and replaced by a table and an Ash yam Urn.

- [u]Tweak:[/u] The (IMO) Nordic-themed Animal pelt Rugs have been replaced by regular woven rugs, I recommend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7274]Celtic and braided rugs[/url] to get what you see in the screenshots.


There are 2 versions:

- Main version with new items from the Modders resources and many new features and fixes (Recommended)

- Lite version with only vanilla/Dragonborn items. only minor tweaks. Not as up to date as main version.

choose only one.

[size=4][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31582]Also check out my expansion to the town of Raven Rock[/url][/b][/size]


[size=3][b][u]Also Recommended to use with this mod:[/b][/u][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32777]Severin Manor Guard[/url], a nice addition to the house and compatible.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13586]Decorator Assistant[/url]. must have for anyone who cares about their player homes.


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11370 ]Spouses Can Live Everywhere[/url] to get your spouse to live there.

[b][u]CREDITS:[/b][/u]
- Oaristys for the excellent [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16525]Modders resource pack[/url]
author: uglydemon

files.name: Severin Manor improvements with New Items 1_6
files.fileName: Severin Manor improvements with New Items 1_6-31167-1-6.zip
files.changelogHtml:
- Vanilla fix: Added activators to Display cases. you can now properly "insert" weapons in them. Not staffs though.
- Added a manniquen and 2 racks to the corridor leading to crafting area.
- Added a manniquen and 2 racks to the side bedroom.
- Turned 2 static barrels in crafting area to container barrels.
- Strong Box in the bedroom above the safe is now a proper container. But with a less unique model.
- New Bookcase and chair in main Hall.
- Increased light slightly in the tanning rack area.
- New idle markers added in house, useful if you have a follower/spouse sandboxing around so they'd do something else rather than chomp on food all day.
- crafting area safe was incorrectly using the same base as the bedroom safe. turned into a different ID safe. ***remove your items from that safe before upgrading.*** All other containers in the house are upgrade-safe.
- The chest infront of main bed is now a nice looking footlocker instead.

files.changelogHtml:
New: An activatable unique Soul Gem Chest in the enchanting room for your soul gem storage.
New: An activatable unique Liquor Rack in the main hall using the new Dunmer Liquor Bottles for your Drinks storage.
New: 4 activatable unique Food crates with food meshes nicely organized in them: Meat crate, Ash Foods crate, Cheese and Bread crate, and Produce crate. see screenshots.
New: Bookshelf in Enchanting room under the Soul Gem Chest.
New: 2 new Mannequins and rack sets in front of the main Bed.
New: 2 new Mannequins and rack sets in front of the guest Bed.
Fix: All shadow striping from lights should now be fixed.
Fix: The bed in the guest room has been assigned to player faction rather than the player, so it would be usable for guests/followers if you use a mod for that.
